desc.en: When Yuuka dropped by Schale's office to hand in a report, she learned of Sensei's disorganized and carefree lifestyle. In response, Yuuka scolds Sensei and organizes the receipts in the office.
desc.jp: When Yuuka dropped by Schale's office to hand in a report, she learned of Sensei's disorganized and carefree lifestyle. In response, Yuuka scolds Sensei and organizes the receipts in the office.
desc.thai: When Yuuka dropped by Schale's office to hand in a report, she learned of Sensei's disorganized and carefree lifestyle. In response, Yuuka scolds Sensei and organizes the receipts in the office.
desc.ko: When Yuuka dropped by Schale's office to hand in a report, she learned of Sensei's disorganized and carefree lifestyle. In response, Yuuka scolds Sensei and organizes the receipts in the office.
desc.zh_tw: 優香来到夏萊的办公室转交报告时，亲眼目睹老师毫无节制的生活习惯。優香一边替老师整理发票一边碎碎念。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 优香来到夏莱的办公室转交报告时，亲眼目睹老师毫无节制的生活习惯。优香一边替老师整理发票一边碎碎念。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 优香来到夏莱的办公室转交报告时，亲眼目睹老师毫无节制的生活习惯。优香一边替老师整理发票一边碎碎念。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 优香来到沙勒的办公室转交报告时，亲眼目睹老师毫无节制的生活习惯。优香一边替老师整理发票一边碎碎念。

desc.en: Yuuka gets in touch with Sensei and says that she would like to count the weapon usage in the previous battle to generate a financial report. Sensei says that he doesn't know how to fill a said report and Yuuka promises that she will assist Sensei the next time she dropped by Schale.
desc.jp: Yuuka gets in touch with Sensei and says that she would like to count the weapon usage in the previous battle to generate a financial report. Sensei says that he doesn't know how to fill a said report and Yuuka promises that she will assist Sensei the next time she dropped by Schale.
desc.thai: Yuuka gets in touch with Sensei and says that she would like to count the weapon usage in the previous battle to generate a financial report. Sensei says that he doesn't know how to fill a said report and Yuuka promises that she will assist Sensei the next time she dropped by Schale.
desc.ko: Yuuka gets in touch with Sensei and says that she would like to count the weapon usage in the previous battle to generate a financial report. Sensei says that he doesn't know how to fill a said report and Yuuka promises that she will assist Sensei the next time she dropped by Schale.
desc.zh_tw: 優香联系上了老师，表示要清算一下在上次战斗中消耗的武器数量，以便报告财务情况。老师表示自己不会填财务报告，優香表示下次拜访夏萊时会协助老师。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 优香联系上了老师，表示要清算一下在上次战斗中消耗的武器数量，以便报告财务情况。老师表示自己不会填财务报告，优香表示下次拜访夏莱时会协助老师。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 优香联系上了老师，表示要清算一下在上次战斗中消耗的武器数量，以便报告财务情况。老师表示自己不会填财务报告，优香表示下次拜访夏莱时会协助老师。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 优香联系上了老师，表示要清算一下在上次战斗中消耗的武器数量，以便报告财务情况。老师表示自己不会填财务报告，优香表示下次拜访沙勒时会协助老师。

desc.en: Yuuka visits Schale while Sensei is having lunch, and so she starts looking over Sensei's bills. Soon, Yuuka notices Sensei's account balance is quite unusual and finds that Sensei has multiple large purchases. And for this reason Yuuka starts checking all the bills and invoices.
desc.jp: Yuuka visits Schale while Sensei is having lunch, and so she starts looking over Sensei's bills. Soon, Yuuka notices Sensei's account balance is quite unusual and finds that Sensei has multiple large purchases. And for this reason Yuuka starts checking all the bills and invoices.
desc.thai: Yuuka visits Schale while Sensei is having lunch, and so she starts looking over Sensei's bills. Soon, Yuuka notices Sensei's account balance is quite unusual and finds that Sensei has multiple large purchases. And for this reason Yuuka starts checking all the bills and invoices.
desc.ko: Yuuka visits Schale while Sensei is having lunch, and so she starts looking over Sensei's bills. Soon, Yuuka notices Sensei's account balance is quite unusual and finds that Sensei has multiple large purchases. And for this reason Yuuka starts checking all the bills and invoices.
desc.zh_tw: 優香来到夏萊，正好遇到老师吃饭，便开始帮助老师处理账单。很快，優香注意到老师的账户余额很有问题，并发现老师进行了多笔大额消费，于是开始检查老师的全部账单和发票记录。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 优香来到夏莱，正好遇到老师吃饭，便开始帮助老师处理账单。很快，优香注意到老师的账户余额很有问题，并发现老师进行了多笔大额消费，于是开始检查老师的全部账单和发票记录。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 优香来到夏莱，正好遇到老师吃饭，便开始帮助老师处理账单。很快，优香注意到老师的账户余额很有问题，并发现老师进行了多笔大额消费，于是开始检查老师的全部账单和发票记录。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 优香来到沙勒，正好遇到老师吃饭，便开始帮助老师处理账单。很快，优香注意到老师的账户余额很有问题，并发现老师进行了多笔大额消费，于是开始检查老师的全部账单和发票记录。

desc.en: While managing the bills, Yuuka scolds Sensei.
desc.jp: While managing the bills, Yuuka scolds Sensei.
desc.thai: While managing the bills, Yuuka scolds Sensei.
desc.ko: While managing the bills, Yuuka scolds Sensei.
desc.zh_tw: 優香一边整理账单，一边对老师碎碎念。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 优香一边整理账单，一边对老师碎碎念。

desc.en:
The 17th track in Blue Archive OST, usually plays in the "Store" page. It's also widely known as the song for the recollection lobby of Yuuka's.
Its title can be translated into "Welcome" in English, the greetings when you enter a store or restaurant.
desc.jp:
The 17th track in Blue Archive OST, usually plays in the "Store" page. It's also widely known as the song for the recollection lobby of Yuuka's.
Its title can be translated into "Welcome" in English, the greetings when you enter a store or restaurant.
desc.thai:
The 17th track in Blue Archive OST, usually plays in the "Store" page. It's also widely known as the song for the recollection lobby of Yuuka's.

desc.ko:
The 17th track in Blue Archive OST, usually plays in the "Store" page. It's also widely known as the song for the recollection lobby of Yuuka's.
Its title can be translated into "Welcome" in English, the greetings when you enter a store or restaurant.
desc.zh_cn:
蔚蓝档案OST的第十七首曲子，常在“商店”页播放，也是优香回忆大厅的主题曲。
曲子的标题在日语中意为“欢迎”，即当你走进一家商店或餐厅时所会听到的问候语。
desc.zh_tw:
The 17th track in Blue Archive OST, usually plays in the "Store" page. It's also widely known as the song for the recollection lobby of Yuuka's.
Its title can be translated into "Welcome" in English, the greetings when you enter a store or restaurant.

school.jp: ミレニアムサイエンススクール

desc.en: After that, Yuuka says in order to let Sensei have a more responsible spending habit, she requests that Sensei should talk with her in advance before spending more than 5000 yen on any items. Then, Yuuka leaves after another scolding.
desc.jp: After that, Yuuka says in order to let Sensei have a more responsible spending habit, she requests that Sensei should talk with her in advance before spending more than 5000 yen on any items. Then, Yuuka leaves after another scolding.
desc.thai: After that, Yuuka says in order to let Sensei have a more responsible spending habit, she requests that Sensei should talk with her in advance before spending more than 5000 yen on any items. Then, Yuuka leaves after another scolding.
desc.ko: After that, Yuuka says in order to let Sensei have a more responsible spending habit, she requests that Sensei should talk with her in advance before spending more than 5000 yen on any items. Then, Yuuka leaves after another scolding.
desc.zh_tw: 之后，優香为了表示为了让老师更有计划地花费，于是要求老师每次购买超过5000日元以上的东西时，都要和她商量一遍。之后，優香唠叨几句后就离开了。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 之后，优香为了表示为了让老师更有计划地花费，于是要求老师每次购买超过5000日元以上的东西时，都要和她商量一遍。之后，优香唠叨几句后就离开了。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 之后，优香为了表示为了让老师更有计划地花费，于是要求老师每次购买超过5000日元以上的东西时，都要和她商量一遍。之后，优香唠叨几句后就离开了。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 之后，优香为了表示为了让老师更有计划地花费，于是要求老师每次购买超过5000日元以上的东西时，都要和她商量一遍。之后，优香唠叨几句后就离开了。
